text: Superbad is a 2007 American teen sex comedy movie. It was produced by Judd Apatow, Evan Goldberg, Seth Rogen and Shauna Robertson and was directed by Greg Mottola. Superbad was released on August 17, 2007 in North America. The movie received positive reviews with a 88% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 76 out of 100 from Metacritic. == Cast == * Jonah Hill as Seth * Michael Cera as Evan * Christopher Mintz-Plasse as Fogell/McLovin' * Emma Stone as Jules * Bill Hader as Officer Slater * Seth Rogen as Officer Michaels * Martha MacIsaac as Becca * Aviva Baumann as Nicola * Joe Lo Truglio as Francis the Driver * Kevin Corrigan as Mark * Clark Duke as Teen at the Party == Other websites == *Superbad's official website * * Category:2007 movies Category:2000s buddy movies Category:2000s sex comedy movies Category:2000s teen comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about virginity
title: Superbad (movie)
